entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-13
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • October 2021 .NET Updates #203
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2021-41355 | .NET Core Information Disclosure Vulnerability #202

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Use generic math in System.Numerics.Vectors test utils #60365
    Future
  • [mono] Crash in github runner due to null AssemblyLoadContext.GetLoadContext result #60348
    6.0.0
  • Assert in mini-codegen.c on Mono x86 #60347
    7.0.0
  • Enum.GetName returns wrong name of enum value. #60346
  • Microsoft.Windows.Compatibility should reference the latest System.Data.SqlClient #60345
    6.0.0
  • Crossgen2: System.BadImageFormatException: Read out of bounds #60343
  • [API Proposal]: Add String.Join(char, IEnumerable<string>) #60342
  • RuntimeIdentifierTests.VerifyOSRid started failing on macOS ARM64 #60341
  • [wasm][debugger] Evaluate testList[0] #60340
  • [SyncContext(contextName)] #60336
  • [iOS] Test_GetCurrentMethod_Inlineable test failed #60334
  • Create microbenchmarks for SequenceReader<T>.TryReadExact #60332
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'child->isContained()' #60330
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Performance/CodeQuality/Inlining/NoThrowInline/NoThrowInline.sh #60324
  • Code cleanup: Remove EffectiveKeyLength from BasicSymmetricCipher types #60322
    7.0.0
  • DAC crashes WinDBGX on DBG/CHK builds #60321
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Tests.CounterCreationDataCollectionTests.PerformanceCounterCategory_CreateCategory #58413
    Future
  • RyuJIT: Invalidly optimized negated division #60297
    7.0.0
  • DataContractJsonSerializer with JObject results in stack overflow #59218
  • .NET 6 regression on writing to character device #59754
    6.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter tests fail on Windows 10 #25786
    Future
  • PerformanceCounter_IncrementBy_IncrementByReadOnly Failure for Windows 8.1 #24176
    Future
  • InstanceDataCollection_* failures in CI #25253
    Future
  • System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.RegexMatchTests.Match_ExcessPrefix Failing in CI #59541
    7.0.0
  • .NET misreports current culture after upgrading to .NET6 #60296
    7.0.0
  • JIT: crc32 bad codegen for contained constant address #59714
    7.0.0
  • File.ReadAllBytes* should support non-seekable files #58383
    7.0.0
  • [libraries] System.Native fails to build with clang-13 #60326
  • SignedCms: does not enable RSASSA-PSS signing #60125
    7.0.0
  • plugins fail to load for dotnet 6 single file - self contained app #59961
    6.0.0
  • [JIT][arm64] recognize Interlocked.Increment in volatile increment #60021
    7.0.0
  • [JIT][arm64] double dmb #60023
    7.0.0
  • Delete Microsoft.IO.Redist.csproj #58334
    7.0.0
  • Error in the documentation of the Task.ContinueWith method? #59620
    7.0.0
  • API Proposal: SequenceReader<T>.TryRead overloads to read a specified number of elements #30778
    Future
  • runtime.osx-arm64.runtime.native.System.IO.Ports missing #59972
    6.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Make all delegates support fully general generics (In support of Action/Func of everything) #60377
  • Remove duplicate entries from dotnet --info #60376
    area-Host
  • Update SuperPMI CI automation #60375
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add design details regarding dynamic buffers in struct marshalling #60374
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Remove RC2 EffectiveKeyLength #60373
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Fix PerformanceCounter tests #60372
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, area-System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter
  • [release/6.0] Move 2 Drawing APIs that are not implemented in netfx to net6.0 or later #60371
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Drawing
  • Eliminate pre-built assets during source-build #60370
    area-Infrastructure
  • [Group 5] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Ini` #60368
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [NO MERGE] [mono] testing initial bits of byref of byref #60367
    * NO MERGE *, area-VM-meta-mono
  • SrcGen fast-path serialization for nullable structs (#59719) #60366
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [HTTP/3] Fixed stress #60364
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Implement IAsyncEnumerable<T>.ToBlockingEnumerable #60363
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix CRC32 encoding #60360
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Port: Fix StartTLS in DirectoryService.Protocols in 6.0 to main #60359
    area-System.DirectoryServices
  • prevent manifest sending for special cased event sources #60357
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 7.0.0
  • JIT: fix interaction of GDV and boxing #60355
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove FlakyAppHostTests category in installer tests #60354
    area-Host
  • [reflection] Initialize default ALC gchandle in GetLoadContext #60350
    area-System.Reflection-mono
  • Add Fuzzlyn to CI #60344
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][test] BrowserHttpHandler stream large responses with SetBrowserResponseStreamingEnabled #60339
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, test enhancement, 7.0.0
  • [WIP]: Fix broken callstacks in interpreter on MonoVM. #60338
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Experiment with Roslyn optimization for ROS<T> in assembly data section #60327

Merged

  • Constraint generic work #60320
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Remove DIV(NEG(a), C) => DIV(a, NEG(C)) opt #60312
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix: CTS.TryReset() concurrency issue #60182 #60323
    area-System.Threading
  • Merge RC2 tag into release/6.0 branch #60358
    area-System.DirectoryServices
  • Adjust SkipOnCoreClr for Match_ExcessPrefix test #59564
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix ref field loading, when metadata type is actually ref type #60356
  • Remove `Microsoft.IO.Redist`. #58359
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix System.Numerics.Vectors tests on iOS and other FullAOT targets #60335
    area-System.Numerics, os-ios
  • Fix build with clang 13 #60328
    area-PAL-libraries, community-contribution
  • Fix CRC32 encoding #60329
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support unseekable filestream when ReadAllBytes[Async] #58434
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add test for struct with ref field #60352
  • Don't include s390x in coreclr outerloop runs #60351
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #60318
    area-System.DirectoryServices
  • Add tizen armel build CI for pull request #56281
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement RSA-PSS signature for CmsSigner #60316
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Eliminate pre-built assets during source-build #60315
    area-Infrastructure
  • Update Package Validation dependency and update Suppression files #60306
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] Make upgrade install new host first, then uninstall old #60317
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Fix build break #60333
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/5.0] Make upgrade install new host first, then uninstall old #60325
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][interp] Change GC state explicitly #60242
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • JIT: Optimize redundant memory barriers on arm/arm64 #60219
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Finish59071 update ci argsh for r6.0 #60100
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.0
  • Remove ObjectDisposedException from the docs of the Task.ContinueWith #59822
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • lateapexearlyspeed-issue-30778 Create method: TryReadExact(). #57921
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add SetLastError to GdiPlus methods (#59096) #60201
    Servicing-approved
  • Add runtime.osx-arm64.runtime.native.System.IO.Ports proj file for pa… #60310
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Add osx-arm64.runtime.native.System.IO.Ports #60084
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, community-contribution, 6.0.0
  • Fix license header in a few new files #59910
    area-Meta
  • Fix typo in comment for UseUtcTimestamp #60043
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • [Group 3] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration` #57414
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix: CTS.TryReset() concurrency issue #60182 #60224
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution

Updated

  • Loop Alignment support for Arm64 #60135
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reflection Invoke share more coreclr/mono #60270
    area-System.Reflection
  • Update THIRD-PARTY-NOTICES.TXT #60092
    area-Setup
  • [wasm] rationalize internal exports #60075
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.FileExtensions` #57434
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [metadata] Replace uses of MonoType:byref by a getter #60313
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Consume PosixSignal in Hosting.Systemd's SystemdLifetime #59880
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Test fix: FileStream DeleteOnClose run on OuterLoop with longer timeout #60149
    area-System.IO
  • [mono][interp] Implement tailcalls #59799
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • FileStatus.Unix/Process.Unix: align caching of user identity. #60160
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Fix VS4Mac crash report and core dump generation perf problems #60319
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • XARCH: Eliminate redundant mov to/from mem. #59780
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • make CryptQueryObject call compliant to interop guidelines #60218
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Stabilize for RTM #60294
    * NO MERGE *, area-Infrastructure, 6.0.0
  • Bring up full library test CI runs on iOS / tvOS devices #59503
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Search native code in all R2R ni.dll in version bubble #57277
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono/win] Increase stack size (reserve) to 8MB #60265
    area-Build-mono
  • Refactoring XmlConvert #60285
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • [mono/win] Build native runtime as Debug again #60263
    area-Build-mono
  • Don't cache commandline in coreclr diagnostics server #60275
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.EnvironmentVariables` #57433
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.CommandLine` #57432
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • fix https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/issues/60282 #60283
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • FileSystem.Unix: Directory.Delete: remove per item syscall. #59520
    area-System.IO
  • Add API entry for JsonDocument converter #60236
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Question: Replacing locals on the shadow stack with OBJ/IND #1652
  • [DllImportGenerator] "MarshalUsing" ignores "ref" return type #1650

Closed

  • Idea: Tracking based Native AOT #1642

PullRequests

Created

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Add support for struct types in signatures. #1649

Merged

  • build platform package without BuildAllConfigurations #1651
  • regex sampler (utility for regex input generation) #1639

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Untriaged, untagged issue #22025
  • Unable to build the .NET MAUI Preview 9 project, VS IDE reports missing components, maui-check tool unable to find the package as it still points to RC 1 source feed #22009

Closed

  • PrivateAsset PackageReferences causing framework dependencies to be dropped from the publish operation #17218
    6.0.1xx
  • .NET Global tools create applaunch executable for wrong architecture on Apple Silicon #17241
    6.0.1xx
  • Current 6.0 SDK building in VS errors with 'Microsoft.NET.SDK.WorkloadAutoImportPropsLocator' specified could not be found. #17461
    6.0.1xx
  • Build message for MAUI workload results in error #18580
    6.0.1xx
  • ASP: Security policy would not allow process: /Users/<username>/.dotnet/tools/dotnet-ef #19560
    6.0.1xx
  • Time to remove microsoft.net.sdk.testworkload.manifest #18870
    6.0.1xx
  • [Loc]With net6 preview 7 installed on locale OS, warning description is unlocalized when runing "dotnet run -p .." in CLI. #18958
    6.0.1xx
  • improper info is shown in CLI when using dotnet run -p #22000
  • Exception in dotnet build using ModuleInitializerAttribute and BenchmarkDotNet. #21094

PullRequests

Created

  • Configure an environment variable when BrowserRefresh agent is injected #22023
    Servicing-consider, Area-AspNetCore
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #22001
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix demand for internal build on Windows #21999
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0.4xx #21990
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add OS and Process Architecture #21517
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix run warning output formatting issue #22010
    Area-CLI
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0.2xx #21991
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable signing of tools host on mac (#21894) #21958
    Servicing-approved
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1.4xx #21993
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1.1xx #21992
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [ASP.NET] Tidy up messages in GenerateStaticWebAssetsDevelopmentManifest #21974
    Servicing-approved, Area-AspNetCore
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #21885
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Fix ConcatenateCssFiles when used with Razor class libraries #21982
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, 6.0.1xx
  • Use NuGetPackageVersion in dotnet.*.js file name #21919
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix `dotnet list package` when current directory contains a `#` character in Unix systems #20449
    Area-NuGet
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'main' #21199
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-13
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Open issue: how to mitigate break for length patterns? #5226
  • [DoesNotReturn] warning is only reported in nullable-enabled context #5231

Updated

  • Can't use C# 8.0 using declaration with a discard #2235
    Backlog

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • In Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Collections, pin S.C.Immutable to 5.0.0 to allow prebuilt reduction downstream #57129
  • Roslyn fails to report nullability problems in lambda expression conversions #57126
  • refactoring: invert condition for int? comparison errs #57124
  • Intellisense not suggest "return" keyword when i am typing in Console Top Level statement #57121
    17.1
  • Roslyn fails to detect nullability issues in binary expression with delegates such as addition #57120

Closed

  • Support Code Definition Window #4224
    Backlog
  • Support auto formatting C # #57051
  • 'ExtractMethodCodeRefactoringProvider' encounters error and is disabled #57079
  • Roslyn incorrectly learns from [MemberNotNullWhen] annotation on Nullable<T> properties in pattern matching when there's no true/false tests #51942
    17.1
  • File scoped namespace prevents contained using statements from being collapsible #57032

PullRequests

Created

  • Support 'ref' type arguments in delegates #57135
    Area-Compilers
  • API for getting a deterministic key for a Compilation #57134
    Area-Compilers
  • Moving WinForms Editor Factory logic to WinForms #57133
    Area-IDE
  • Remove the BranchId concept from teh workspace #57132
    Area-IDE
  • Remove constraint check in interesting scenario for dynamic constraint checking feature #57131
    Area-Compilers
  • Move stack allocations to start of the method to avoid repeated allocations in loops #57130
    Area-Compilers
  • BranchId experiments. #57128
    Area-IDE
  • Removed collapse for namespace level #57125
    Area-IDE
  • RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan optimization for stackalloc #57123
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Respond to cancellation when a generator is running, so we can still report time. #57122
    Area-Compilers
  • Ensure new files are formatted based on the right language version #57119
    Area-IDE
  • Honor suppression on tuple element in switch #57118
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, 17.1
  • Fix import reader #57117
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #57115
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Move feature check from lexer to binder. #57113
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Add quick runtime checks to ensure core workspace invariants hold. #57109
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Support the code definition window #56102
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57099
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Prefer params Span<T> or ReadOnlySpan<T> over params T[] in overload resolution #57127
    Area-Compilers
  • Handle potential stack overflow in regex parsing. #57105
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix analysis of MemberNotNullWhen in patterns #57083
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, Next
  • Remove cast tweak cases from https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/pull/57061 #57080
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Added filescoped namespaces as a structure able to be collapsed #57108
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #57116
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Use release version of Debugger.Contracts #57114
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Log unexpected cancellation state in RemoteCallback<T> #57005
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #57137
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57136
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Support params Span<T> #57078
    Area-Compilers
  • Async lightbulb performance improvement for compiler analyzer execution #56844
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, 17.0
  • StackFrame Parser/Lexer as EmbeddedLanguage #56957
    Area-IDE
  • Error when ref is used on a parameter or return type of an UnmanagedCallersOnly method #57043
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix 'T is new()' crash #57091
    Area-Compilers
  • Apply arcade-powered source-build patches #55823
    Area-Infrastructure, Source-Build
  • Report a level 7 warning for lower-cased type names #56905
    Area-Compilers
  • Completion: Suggest "await" after dot of awaitable expression #55817
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Community
  • Allow us to dispose batches asynchronously #53768
    Area-IDE
  • Go To Definition from source information in PDBs #57073
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Use 1ES build pools #56186
    Area-Infrastructure
  • IDECoreBenchmarks Changes #57112
    Area-IDE
  • Pass completion options explicitly throughout the implementation of completion providers #57058
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Remove #pragma suppressions from EditorFeatures.Cocoa #56974
    Area-IDE
  • Codefix for CS1591: Add ///<inheritdoc/> #57004
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Semi auto implemented properties #57076
    Area-Compilers, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Client side not publishing correctly #37535
  • JSInProcessObjectReferenceExtensions.InvokeVoid should call IJSInProcessObjectReference.Invoke<IJSVoidResult> #37528
  • HttpConnectionContext Disposes WindowsIdentity objects it does not own #37521
  • [release/5.0] Invalid json in package.json for the reactredux template #37520
  • Allow Blazor event propagation ( bubbling up the event ) #37517
  • Conflicting assets with the same target path 'service-worker.js'. #37516
  • Can't launch Blazor WebAssembly sample apps from VS within this repo code #37514
  • Publishing a Blazor Wasm project process seems to run twice if the "wasm-tools" workload is installed in .NET6 RC2. #37513
  • Use given model nullability in razor pages #37510
  • Newly-added/renamed static files give 404 when launching from VS #37508
    6.0.0
  • Blazor: Compilation error for a razor file with a component receiving Cascading Type Parameter and containing a generic RenderFragment #37506
  • Razor class library - staticwebassets folder not included after first build #37505
  • HotReload causing runtime issue #37504

Closed

  • Startup regression: fortunes_dapper #37476
  • Perf regression: mvc #37459
  • Error after adding UseWindowsService and publishing #37464
  • Accessibility issues in templates #37455
    6.0.0
  • DefaultHealthCheckService should use CreateAsyncScope() #37296
    7.0-preview1
  • WebAssembly+Identity template app produces "failed to fetch" error #37355
    .NET 7 Planning
  • httpclient Content.Headers.ContentDisposition.FileName returns null when the file name has space in it #37486
  • File > New Blazor WASM first load takes over 8 minutes #37509
  • Building tag v6.0.0-rc.2.21480.10 fails installing dotnet #37442
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.StackExchangeRedis: SetFeatureFlag for ConnectionMultiplexer #37507

PullRequests

Created

  • HTTP headers enumerator move directly to next #37538
    area-runtime
  • Fix multiple dictionary add in polly #37537
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Only attempt to import blazor-hotreload.js is AspNetCore Browser tool… #37536
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor
  • Update node js version in container #37534
    area-blazor
  • Fix multiple dictionary add in polly #37533
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Pass IJSVoidResult instead of object to Invoke to indicate void result #37532
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Only attempt to import blazor-hotreload.js is AspNetCore Browser tools middleware is present #37531
    area-blazor
  • [release/6.0] Don't start the .NET webassembly app inside the auth iframe. Fixes #37355 #37524
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor
  • Set the aria-invalid attribute to "true" instead of true (v2) #37523
    area-blazor, 6.0.0
  • Fix playwright tests on helix matrix #37518
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Accessibility fixes in templates #37525
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, area-blazor, 6.0.0
  • [5.0] Update SiteExtension #37489
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.12
  • Accessibility fixes in templates #37479
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • Health checks can use dependencies that implement IAsyncDisposable only #37297
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1
  • Don't start the .NET webassembly app inside the auth iframe. Fixes #37355 #37515
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 7.0-preview1
  • [6.0] Update SiteExtension #37490
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.0
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #37500
    tell-mode, 5.0.12
  • [main] Update SiteExtension #37491
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Wait for Redis to be ready in tests #37102
    area-signalr
  • Fix #37340 by guarding the initial ping for SignalR #37414
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Added nullable overload for markupString #37265
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fixes #37340 #37417
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • `<Virtualize>` Fixing `data-fetching` when horizontal scrolling is present on table layout #37451
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Improve project reference consistency #37338
    area-infrastructure
  • [ANCM] Add disableRotatationOnConfig flag to handler settings #37474
    servers-iis, area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • bpmd for single-file app under lldb at program launch doesn't work #2673
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Use PEImage API get export symbols for single file apps #2674
  • [Ignore] Testing cancel session start with log messages #2672

Merged

  • Switch to 1ES servicing pools on release/stable #2668

Updated

  • Fix processor to cancel/fail session started task source. #2665

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Bug] iOS app missing splash screen after updating #2937
  • [Enhancement] RetryOnConnectionFailure #2936
  • [Bug] Current Remap strategy inside controls doesn't work when Element is referenced inside App.Xaml Style #2935
  • Multiple NU1603 warnings with Microsoft.Maui.Extensions 6.0.101-preview.9.1843 #2934
  • [Bug] Grid doesn't appear to be consistently constraining #2933
  • [Bug] images loaded from URI's on iOS aren't currently re-measuring #2932

  • [Bug] CollectionView not working #2929
  • [Bug] Xaml Live Preview option not showing up #2924

Closed

    6.0.101-preview.10
  • This version of Microsoft.MacCatalyst requires the MacCatalyst 15.0 SDK (shipped with Xcode 13.0). #2829

PullRequests

Created

Merged

    area/layout 🔲
  • Add code to use `@(MauiIcon)` instead of `@(MauiImage)` with several properties #2869

    do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-13
entry.content:
Issues

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-13
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Merge issue with codeflow from RC2 -> main/GA resulted in some dead code. #12339
  • dotnet --info Duplicate output information #12264

Updated

  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main validation-installer-.NET Core SDK 3.1.4xx, installer, .NET Core SDK 3.1.4xx #installer-113806-.NETCoreSDK3.1.4xx #12329

  • .NET 6.0.100-rc.2.21505.57 installation location is missing on installation wizard within a clean Windows OS #12283
  • In VS move baseline manifests to separate msis #12352
  • Windows bundle installation conditions are unlocalized #12300
